description:
Checks whether the `data` input is a boolean.

Example:

1.  false@0 is received via `data`
2. true@0 is sent via `is boolean`

52a394b8-a406-424b-83fc-d6446eceb21f.name: is boolean
52a394b8-a406-424b-83fc-d6446eceb21f.description: Sends true if the input is a boolean, false otherwise.

name: boolean/Type tester
